# vfs_isrdonly

**Function**

Determine if a filesystem is mounted read-only.

## Declaration

```swift
int vfs_isrdonly(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount to test.

## Return Value

Nonzero if filesystem is mounted read-only, else 0.
title: vfs_isrdonly
